title: Strange Font Icons in Win 7
content:
Hello,

I have just generated a Family with 12 weights:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809064808im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2013-03-15_12h23_26_6386.png)

All Fonts do have the same characterset, glyphorder, Unicode rages, Codepages. MS FontValidator and Adobe CompareFamily don't show any problems.

Any idea why some fonts show a correct icon and others don't?

Best  
Eigi
author: eigi

comments.content:
Excuse the rumour

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809064808im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Icons2_6042.png)
  
Computer restart solved the problem ...
